attributes.action: look at the bank charges ,for people on benifits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have been charged, £115 on one month ,then the next month ,i am c £68, where is the fareness,the banks know im on benifits,yet there charge system is over the top,the bank is one you bailed out ,lloyds tsb,i personaly have had to do with out food and heating ,is that fare  ,
